segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 4
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 4

segments.pli: 20. Mahāvagga
segments.en: 20. The Great Chapter

segments.pli: 197. Mallikādevīsutta
segments.en: 197. Queen Mallikā

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho mallikā devī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho mallikā devī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Queen Mallikā went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:

segments.pli: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya;
segments.en: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why in this life some females are ugly, unattractive, and bad-looking;

segments.pli: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca?
segments.en: and poor, with few assets and possessions; and insignificant?

segments.pli: Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya;
segments.en: And why are some females ugly, unattractive, and bad-looking;

segments.pli: aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā ca?
segments.en: but rich, affluent, wealthy, and illustrious?

segments.pli: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā;
segments.en: And why are some females attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty;

segments.pli: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca?
segments.en: but poor, with few assets and possessions; and insignificant?

segments.pli: Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā, aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā cā”ti?
segments.en: And why are some females attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty; and rich, affluent, wealthy, and illustrious?”

segments.pli: “Idha, mallike, ekacco mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā.
segments.en: “Take a female who is irritable and bad-tempered.

segments.pli: Appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
segments.en: Even when criticized a little bit she loses her temper, becoming annoyed, hostile, and hard-hearted, and displaying annoyance, hate, and bitterness.

segments.pli: Sā na dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
segments.en: She doesn’t give to ascetics or brahmins such things as food, drink, clothing, vehicles; garlands, fragrance, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.

segments.pli: Issāmanikā kho pana hoti;
segments.en: And she’s jealous,

segments.pli: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu issati upadussati issaṃ bandhati.
segments.en: envying, resenting, and begrudging the possessions, honor, respect, reverence, homage, and veneration given to others.

segments.pli: Sā ce tato cutā itthattaṃ āgacchati, sā yattha yattha paccājāyati dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya;
segments.en: If she comes back to this state of existence after passing away, wherever she is reborn she’s ugly, unattractive, and bad-looking;

segments.pli: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca.
segments.en: and poor, with few assets and possessions; and insignificant.

segments.pli: Idha pana, mallike, ekacco mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā.
segments.en: Take another female who is irritable and bad-tempered. …

segments.pli: Appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
Sā dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
segments.en: But she does give to ascetics or brahmins …

segments.pli: Anissāmanikā kho pana hoti;
segments.en: And she’s not jealous …

segments.pli: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu na issati na upadussati na issaṃ bandhati.
Sā ce tato cutā itthattaṃ āgacchati, sā yattha yattha paccājāyati dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya;
segments.en: If she comes back to this state of existence after passing away, wherever she is reborn she’s ugly, unattractive, and bad-looking;

segments.pli: aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā ca.
segments.en: but rich, affluent, wealthy, and illustrious.

segments.pli: Idha pana, mallike, ekacco mātugāmo akkodhanā hoti anupāyāsabahulā.
segments.en: Take another female who isn’t irritable and bad-tempered. …

segments.pli: Bahumpi vuttā samānā nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati, na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
Sā na dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
segments.en: But she doesn’t give to ascetics or brahmins …

segments.pli: Issāmanikā kho pana hoti;
segments.en: And she’s jealous …

segments.pli: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu issati upadussati issaṃ bandhati.
Sā ce tato cutā itthattaṃ āgacchati, sā yattha yattha paccājāyati abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā;
segments.en: If she comes back to this state of existence after passing away, wherever she is reborn she’s attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty;

segments.pli: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca.
segments.en: but poor, with few assets and possessions; and insignificant.

segments.pli: Idha pana, mallike, ekacco mātugāmo akkodhanā hoti anupāyāsabahulā.
segments.en: Take another female who isn’t irritable and bad-tempered. …

segments.pli: Bahumpi vuttā samānā nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati, na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
Sā dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
segments.en: She gives to ascetics and brahmins …

segments.pli: Anissāmanikā kho pana hoti;
segments.en: And she’s not jealous …

segments.pli: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu na issati na upadussati na issaṃ bandhati.
Sā ce tato cutā itthattaṃ āgacchati, sā yattha yattha paccājāyati abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā;
segments.en: If she comes back to this state of existence after passing away, wherever she is reborn she’s attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty;

segments.pli: aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā ca.
segments.en: and rich, affluent, wealthy, and illustrious.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, mallike, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya;
segments.en: This is why are some females are ugly …

segments.pli: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca.
segments.en: and poor … and insignificant.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ pana, mallike, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya;
segments.en: And some females are ugly …

segments.pli: aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā ca.
segments.en: but rich … and illustrious.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, mallike, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā;
segments.en: And some females are attractive …

segments.pli: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca.
segments.en: but poor … and insignificant.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ pana, mallike, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo abhirūpā ca hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā;
segments.en: And some females are attractive …

segments.pli: aḍḍhā ca hoti mahaddhanā mahābhogā mahesakkhā cā”ti.
segments.en: and rich … and illustrious.”

segments.pli: Evaṃ vutte, mallikā devī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When this was said, Queen Mallikā said to the Buddha:

segments.pli: “yā nūnāhaṃ, bhante, aññaṃ jātiṃ kodhanā ahosiṃ upāyāsabahulā,
segments.en: “Sir, in another life I must have been irritable and bad-tempered.

segments.pli: appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjiṃ kuppiṃ byāpajjiṃ patitthīyiṃ kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātvākāsiṃ,
segments.en: Even when lightly criticized I must have lost my temper, becoming annoyed, hostile, and hard-hearted, and displaying annoyance, hate, and bitterness.

segments.pli: sāhaṃ, bhante, etarahi dubbaṇṇā durūpā supāpikā dassanāya.
segments.en: For now I am ugly, unattractive, and bad-looking.

segments.pli: Yā nūnāhaṃ, bhante, aññaṃ jātiṃ dātā ahosiṃ samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, sāhaṃ, bhante, etarahi aḍḍhā mahaddhanā mahābhogā.
segments.en: In another life I must have given to ascetics or brahmins such things as food, drink, clothing, vehicles; garlands, fragrance, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting. For now I am rich, affluent, and wealthy.

segments.pli: Yā nūnāhaṃ, bhante, aññaṃ jātiṃ anissāmanikā ahosiṃ, paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu na issiṃ na upadussiṃ na issaṃ bandhiṃ, sāhaṃ, bhante, etarahi mahesakkhā.
segments.en: In another life, I must not have been jealous, envying, resenting, and begrudging the possessions, honor, respect, reverence, homage, and veneration given to others. For now I am illustrious.

segments.pli: Santi kho pana, bhante, imasmiṃ rājakule khattiyakaññāpi brāhmaṇakaññāpi gahapatikaññāpi, tāsāhaṃ issarādhipaccaṃ kāremi.
segments.en: In this royal court I command maidens of the aristocrats, brahmins, and householders.

segments.pli: Esāhaṃ, bhante, ajjatagge akkodhanā bhavissāmi anupāyāsabahulā,
segments.en: So, sir, from this day forth I will not be irritable and bad-tempered.

segments.pli: bahumpi vuttā samānā nābhisajjissāmi na kuppissāmi na byāpajjissāmi na patitthīyissāmi, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca na pātukarissāmi;
segments.en: Even when heavily criticized I won’t lose my temper, become annoyed, hostile, and hard-hearted, or display annoyance, hate, and bitterness.

segments.pli: dassāmi samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
segments.en: I will give to ascetics or brahmins such things as food, drink, clothing, vehicles; garlands, fragrance, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.

segments.pli: Anissāmanikā bhavissāmi, paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu na ississāmi na upadussissāmi na issaṃ bandhissāmi.
segments.en: I will not be jealous, envying, resenting, and begrudging the possessions, honor, respect, reverence, homage, and veneration given to others.

segments.pli: Abhikkantaṃ, bhante … pe … upāsikaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
segments.en: Excellent, sir! … From this day forth, may the Buddha remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”

segments.pli: Sattamaṃ.

sections.title: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī…

suttaplex.blurb: Queen Mallikā asks about the karmic causes of beauty, wealth, and power.
